long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This fun extension will remind you of three things:
1) Shakespeare was a genius.
2) Take your morning coffee with great literature.
3) Be kind. 

Pop it up whenever you want to get a gentle push on the back. 

Functions:
Produces a fun popup.

Benefits:
In less then a couple of seconds this extension will remind you to read good literature and drink your coffee like you mean it.
